title: (x) thin sans in Penthouse magazine - Gotham {Peter Monrad}
content:
Anyone recognize the sans serif font used in PENTHOUSE magazine?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lav.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130113035845/http:/typophile.com/files/lav.jpg) | 9.1 KB |
author: beege

comments.content:
It looks like Gotham Thin to me.

Check [http://www.typography.com/catalog/gotham/testdriver/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130113035845/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham/testdriver/index.html "http://www.typography.com/catalog/gotham/testdriver/index.html")
...and you should probably post this type of question in the type ID board next time –then I'm sure I wouldn't have been the first to reply.

Thank you...this is the font!

and thanks for the advice on where to post - it's my first day :)

Indeed, member for 2 hours and 5 minutes. :^)

Welcome to Typophile, Brittany. Hope you enjoy your visits.
